title: Servant Learning Program for Enhancing Intercultural Technical Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts and document preparation experience
context.additional_context: A situation where practicing professionals need to acquire communication skills considering cultural contexts when creating math content, providing global content production experience through collaboration with local Indian professionals

learning_goals: Learners can write mathematical solution documents reflecting cultural differences.
Learners can revise content at least twice based on feedback from local practitioners in India.
Learners can design math materials for multicultural audiences according to accessibility principles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
